alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 9:57PM MST until January 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SUNDAY TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 25 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM Sunday to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
